summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx addressed to Jeffrey Epstein for shipping services rendered. It details the charges incurred, including transportation and handling fees, and specifies the payment due date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the individual to whom the invoice is addressed, indicating he is responsible for the payment of the shipping charges.

persons.name: F. Bergmann
persons.context: F. Bergmann is noted as the individual who signed the shipment details on the invoice.

persons.name: ERC Gant
persons.context: ERC Gant is listed as the recipient of the shipment associated with the invoice.

locations: 457 Madison Ave FL 4, New York, NY 10022-6843
keyFacts: The invoice is dated May 10, 2004, and is for shipping services provided by FedEx.
Total charges on the invoice amount to USD $30.70.
The invoice indicates a payment due date of May 25, 2004.
The shipment was picked up on April 29, 2004, and delivered on May 3, 2004.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and a discount applied to the total charges.
